sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>After hitting with a melee attack, the character may knock the target prone by spending one triumph. If the target is larger than the acting character, it requires one additional triumph for each silhouette larger.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Knockdown</name> <number>TAL0001190</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 11:25:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>26aef3de2f3f1490e0f497eef699b6a7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 11:25:02</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
